name: BCP_tm_user
brief: User customization interface for Tree Manager process

algorithms.name:
Tree Manager User Interface for Problem-Specific B&B

BCP_tm_user is the base class for user-defined Tree Manager behavior.
Users derive their own class and override virtual methods.

**Setup methods:**
- initialize_core(): Define core variables, cuts, and matrix
- create_root(): Set up the root node (extra vars/cuts, user data)
- init_new_phase(): Initialize each algorithm phase

**Solution handling:**
- unpack_feasible_solution(): Deserialize solutions from LP
- display_feasible_solution(): Output best solution
- replace_solution(): Secondary objective tie-breaking

**Tree management:**
- change_candidate_heap(): Modify node selection strategy
- display_node_information(): Status output before/after processing
- display_final_information(): Summary after search completes

**Communication:**
- pack_module_data(): Send initialization to LP/CG/VG processes
- process_message(): Handle user-defined messages

**Parameter access:**
- get_param()/set_param(): Query/modify BCP_tm_par parameters
- upper_bound()/lower_bound(): Access global bounds

see: BCP_lp_user for LP process user interface
